parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describedomains?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d\_0) operation to obtain the domain name.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1 to 100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the user account.
